page.title: 02Tourism-Budleigh Salterton
page.content: Tourists come to Budleigh Salterton for the peace of the sea and the countryside.There are four hotels and bed and breakfast accomodation is very popular even into the early autumn. Many people ask about holidays through the{Tourist Information Bureau}in the town and are fussy where they stay. It is a good place for family holidays or for elderly people.Most people stay here for a week or longer. The most popular occupation for holidaymakers are the superb coastal path{walks}and visiting the small villages along the bank of the River Otter.Swimming from the clean,pebble beach is enjoyed by many and there are a variety of day trips available to places of interest such as Bicton Gardens and the Maritime Museum in Exeter.
